name: SGO48
description:
'''SGO48''' (short for ''Saigon 48'', read ''S.G.O. Forty-Eight'') was a Vietnamese [[Japanese idol|idol]] [[girl group]] based in [[Ho Chi Minh City]], Vietnam, the seventh international [[AKB48 Group|sister group]] of [[AKB48]] (after [[Indonesia]]'s [[JKT48]], [[China]]'s [[SNH48]] (''former''), [[Thailand]]'s [[BNK48]], the [[Philippines]] [[MNL48]], China's [[TSH48]], and [[Taiwan]]'s [[TPE48]]). The group debuted on December 22, 2018 and disbanded on their third anniversary, December 22, 2021.

Originally consisting of 29 first-generation members, SGO48 had 20 as of April 2021, thus becoming the Vietnamese girl group with the most members.
